column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I needed to fly out to visit my mom in another state , so I booked a flight on my favorite airline .
#id=2
#text=When the day of the flight arrived , I already had my bags packed , because I plan ahead and packed them the previous night .
#id=3
#text=Then it was time to drive to the airport .
#id=4
#text=I parked my car at a nearby parking garage , and took a special bus called a shuttle to the airport .
#id=5
#text=I arrived 2 hours early , because you want to make sure to have plenty of time to get through security .
#id=6
#text=I went to the check in booth and gave them my information .
#id=7

#text=I would have given them my larger luggage for them to put on the plane right there , but I was traveling light so I only had '' `` carry on '' '' luggage , which I got to bring with me to my seat on the plane .
#id=8
#text=Then I went through the air port security , where I had to take off my shoes and jacket and walk through a scanner .
#id=9
#text=Then I found the gate , the area of the airport where my Plane would arrive .
#text=I stayed near the area , visiting a few gift shops , until the plane arrived and we boarded it .
#text=Soon after , the plane went down the run way and took off .
#text=The flight was n't a long one , so they did n't offer us any food , but we did get a choice of drinks , and I chose a soda .
#text=Then the plane landed at the other airport , and we all got off the plane .
#text=Leaving the airport is much easier than entering it , and I was soon out of the building and met my mother in her car outside .
